name: jquery
title: .jquery
desc: A string containing the jQuery version number.

examples.desc: Determine if an object is a jQuery object
Get the current version of jQuery running on the page

entries.longdesc: The .jquery property is assigned to the jQuery prototype, commonly referred to by its alias $.fn. It is a string containing the version number of jQuery, such as "1.5.0" or "1.4.4".
